DOC.brief_title: Treating Suicidal Behavior Self-Mutilation People With Borderline Personality Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Borderline personality disorder ( BPD ) serious complex condition . BPD affect 2 % 3 % population commonly diagnose young woman . BPD characterize mood swing , impulsive behavior , difficulty control emotion , act inappropriately either self-harm attempt suicide . Other illness depression anxiety also common people diagnosed BPD . Various treatment exist aim reduce self-harm suicide among people BPD . Dialectical behavior therapy ( DBT ) , outpatient behavioral therapy show help self-injurious patient BPD , become popular treatment . Another useful treatment , antidepressant fluoxetine , help regulate mood diminish suicidal self-destructive urge . Although combination treatment DBT fluoxetine common , little research conduct effectiveness kind combine treatment . The purpose study determine whether DBT fluoxetine effective combine alone treat people BPD . All participant double-blind study receive psychiatric medication evaluation prior start treatment . Participants take psychiatric medication prior study slowly withdrawn medication period 2 6 week . Psychological interview self-report questionnaire administer , take approximately 5 10 hour complete . Once preliminary interview evaluation complete , participant randomly assign one four follow treatment group : - Group 1 receive DBT fluoxetine ( Prozac ) . DBT teach patient new skill replace old coping strategy suicide attempt self-injury . Participants work individual therapist 1 hour week learn new skill . This group also expect keep weekly diary discus current mood ; suicidal self-harming urge ; possible use medication , drug , alcohol . Once week participant engage 90-minute skill train group review skill learn therapy . Homework assign session review new strategy skill . Participants meet regularly psychiatrist receive fluoxetine , discuss side effect , adjust dosage necessary . - Group 2 participant receive DBT placebo medication . - Group 3 participant receive supportive therapy fluoxetine . Supportive therapy nondirective focus strength , cop ability , current area difficulty life unstructured format . Participants group meet individual therapist week 50 minute . Patients also assign psychiatrist receive fluoxetine every week . - Group 4 participant receive supportive psychotherapy placebo medication . All patient participate study continue treatment 12 month evaluate bimonthly . After 12 month , participant undergo neuropsychological test identify change occur last year . The clinical status participant also assess 18 24 month .
